techPaths.title: Software Engineer
steps: Start with foundational programming languages: Python, Java, or C++.
Learn about data structures and algorithms.
Explore web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Dive into backend development using frameworks like Node.js and Express.
Master version control with Git and collaborative development.
Explore software architecture and design patterns.
Build real-world projects to apply your skills.
Stay updated with industry trends and continue learning new technologies.
